item.title: 💪🐮6️⃣4️⃣ mailcow: dockerized (ARM64) development stagnates. Will no longer release as stable in 2023
item.author: Niklas Meyer/DerLinkman
item.description:
Moohoo everyone!

We are back with new information on the current ARM64 topic.

Unfortunately, it’s not good news, as you might have guessed from the headline…
